title: OPL Breakdown: Episode 4 - Razleplazm (Timestamps in Description as always)

embed.description: 0:00 - Introduction 3:10 - Dire Wolves vs Chiefs 22:59 - Regicide vs Abyss 37:14 - Legacy vs Sin 51:40 - Avant Garde vs Tainted minds 1:05:10 - MVP of the week 1:10:35 - Dire Wolves vs Regicide Predictions 1:12:07 - Legacy vs Avant Garde Predictions 1:16:07 - Chiefs vs Abyss Predictions 1:21:22 - Tainted Minds vs Sin Predictions 1:26:30 - How did Raz join Dignitas as an analyst?

body: OPL Breakdown Episode 4 with Razleplazm! Discusses the week 1 OPL matchups as well as his career as a caster. Timestamps for all the topics can be found in the description as usual.

replies.body:
Awesome stuff guys.

Great to hear the golden vocal chords of lord leplazm across an extended format!
Great work as always! Keep it up! :D
